title: Injury
effect: 2x+ Injury: Dazed, 4x Injury: Unconscious. Heal to remove.

title: Distress
effect: 3x Distress: Panic. 4x Distress: Hopeless. Rest or use your Vice to recover.

title: Dazed
effect: 2x+ Injury: Your Success counts as Partial success. Get rid of your Injuries to recover.

title: Unconscious
effect: 4x Injury: You are helpless. You cannot take actions until someone revives you. Get rid of your Injuries to recover.

title: Panicked
effect: 3x Distress: Instead of playing a card from your hand, blindly play the top card from the Results deck. Get rid of your Distress to recover.

title: Hopeless
effect: 4x Distress: You can only flee or give up. Get rid of your Distress to recover.

title: Stuck
effect: You cannot move until you free yourself.

title: Hindered
effect: You can only move or take actions, but not both, until you free yourself.

title: Boost
effect: Your next action has +1 Effect or +1 Movement.

title: Frost
effect: Every turn you end with 2x Frost or more, you receive a Distress.

title: Heat
effect: Every turn you end with 2x Heat or more, you receive an Injury.

title: Complication
effect: A Complication makes your life harder. Next action has -1 Effect, then remove.

title: Doom
effect: 3x Doom: You transform into a Monster

title: Salvation
effect: 3x Salvation: You transform back into a Hero
